ygData.subject: Re: Laughing at Striker
ygData.msgSnippet: Last time we had crossover of DBZ and Transformers, things went into chaos. There will be no super-bots, supersayans, or anything like that. ... Striker s eyes

Subject: Re: Laughing at Striker
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: Yanshosh@...

Last time we had crossover of DBZ and Transformers, things went into chaos. 
There will be no super-bots, supersayans, or anything like that.

::Striker::

Striker's eyes narrow as he sees Spears kiss Prebon, his mind trying to 
convince him that it was the chip acting, not her. His eyes narrow further as 
Iguanis enter the cell, Striker's eyes glancing for a second at the cell 
guns. He takes a step back.

"Whipe your own memory," he says calmly, suddenlu croutching into a fighting 
stance as one shoulder blaster opens fire on Iguanis, the other one firing at 
the cell guns.

As he saw it, the Trainers had two choises. They either knocked him out, and 
his internal computer would self destruct, or he would win and got away. 
Either way, they'd have one less hostage. He activates his comm-link, sending 
a quickly-formed transmission.

"Ramulus, you've been a good friend. The meeting's a trap, but get Spears 
back somehow! Perhaps we will meet again sometimes, maybe in the Matrix. I 
doubt I'll live through this," the whole transmission took his computer a 
second to formulate and send, all silently as Striker crouches, ready to 
fight.
